titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2553) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the funding and expenditure authority of the Airport and Airway Trust Fund, to amend title 49, United States Code, to extend the airport improvement program, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-155, by Mr. Webster.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2553 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 54.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 357.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 239 - 183 (Roll no. 608).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 178 (Roll no. 609).

bill.summary: 7/19/2011--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2553) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the funding and expenditure authority of the Airport and Airway Trust Fund, to amend title 49, United States Code, to extend the airport improvement program.
